definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: For pregnant or lactating women, it was appropriate to use the color Doppler examination.
sentences.chinese: 而对于妊娠或哺乳期妇女，宜使用彩色多普勒检查。

sentences.english: WARNING: Not intended for use by pregnant or nursing women. If you are taking any medications, consult your doctor before use.
sentences.chinese: 孕妇，哺乳期妇女或服药者，服用前请咨询医生。

sentences.english: Colostrum composition exhibits major changes after the onset of lactation.
sentences.chinese: 初乳的成分在哺乳期开始后发生变化。

sentences.english: Moreover, a breastfed baby is what his or her mother continues to eat.
sentences.chinese: 还有就是，妈妈接着吃得好，哺乳期的你才会身体好。

sentences.english: It's safe to use the morning-after pill during breast-feeding.
sentences.chinese: 在哺乳期采用紧急避孕药也是安全的。

sentences.english: We should be looking at hormone production during late pregnancy and lactation.
sentences.chinese: 应该对怀孕后期和哺乳期荷尔蒙产生的过程作研究。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss breast-feeding mastitis with three association therapies of the treatment and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨哺乳期乳腺炎采用三联疗法的治疗及预后。

sentences.english: Consult your health care provider if you're breast-feeding.
sentences.chinese: 处于哺乳期的女性使用该药物需要咨询医生。

sentences.english: Do not use if you are pregnant or lactating without first consulting your physician.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用，如果您怀孕或哺乳期不首先咨询你的医生。
我是一个哺乳期的母亲。

sentences.english: Cesarean section 70 days post-lactation period complex wave normal?
sentences.chinese: 破腹产后哺乳期70天月经复潮正常吗？

sentences.english: Pregnant or lactating women should consult a doctor before using any product.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕或哺乳期妇女应就教大夫利用前的任何产品。

sentences.english: Stoll cautions pregnant women, those who are nursing and young children from eating any fish.
sentences.chinese: 斯托尔警告哺乳期的妈妈和小宝宝要慎食鱼类。

sentences.english: Odors inhaled by lactating mothers can affect the flavor of their milk, too.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳期妇女吸入的气味也能影响其乳汁的味道。

sentences.english: Galactorrhea, by definition, is the nonpuerperal secretion of milk.
sentences.chinese: 溢乳的定义是非哺乳期乳汁分泌。

definition: woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
